From Christo 2020-02-17:
I have the following density file for NGRIP from Jakob Schwander (attached). It's not actual data but a spline or model fit (unclear which). We could ask him for the original. Kenji also sampled firn air at NGRIP, and he may have a density file too. I imagine you need something below 80 m? We could run a number of firn models and average them to get the density all the way down to the ice density.



22 1001
Schwander, Jacob
Physics Institute, University of Bern
Ice core density measurements at site NGRIP, Greenland
CRYOSTAT
1 1
2001 6 1 2001 8 1
0
Depth
1
1
99999
Density g/ml
2
Ice core density interpolated from measurements
Consult author first before use.
5
THIS-FILE-NAME=ng1mbp01.den
THIS-FILE-VERSION=1
THIS-FILE-ENDS=2001-08-01
E_MAIL-CONTACT=schwander@climate.unibe.ch
DEPTH(m) Density
